title: cmark_spec_0.30: HTML blocks - example 169

children.value:
import Text.HTML.TagSoup

main :: IO ()
main = print $ parseTags tags

myst:
import Text.HTML.TagSoup

main :: IO ()
main = print $ parseTags tags
okay
html:
import Text.HTML.TagSoup

main :: IO ()
main = print $ parseTags tags

okay

title: cmark_spec_0.30: HTML blocks - example 170
myst:
<script type="text/javascript">
// JavaScript example

document.getElementById("demo").innerHTML = "Hello JavaScript!";
</script>
okay

title: cmark_spec_0.30: HTML blocks - example 182

children.value:
<![CDATA[
function matchwo(a,b)
{
  if (a < b && a < 0) then {
    return 1;

  } else {

    return 0;
  }
}
]]>

myst:
<![CDATA[
function matchwo(a,b)
{
  if (a < b && a < 0) then {
    return 1;

  } else {

    return 0;
  }
}
]]>
okay
html: okay

  - bullets

title: commonmark.quotes: CommonMark blockquote

children.value: To be or not to be

myst: > To be or not to be

title: directives.admonitions: Simple Admonition

children.name: admonition
children.value: An example of an admonition with a _title_.
An example of an admonition with a

myst:
```{admonition} This is a title
  An example of an admonition with a _title_.
```
html:
This is a title

An example of an admonition with a title.

title: directives.admonitions: Admonition with overridding class name

children.name: admonition
children.value: An example of a general `admonition` with a custom _class_.

myst:
```{admonition} This is a title!
:class: tip

An example of a general `admonition` with a custom _class_.
```
html:
This is a title!

An example of a general admonition with a custom class.

title: directives.admonitions: See Also with overridding class name of tip
html:
See Also

Tip class comes first!!

title: directives.code: Code directive, starting line
myst:
```{code} python
:name: My code
:number-lines: 2
:class: fun-code
def five():
  return 5
```
html:
def five():
  return 5

title: directives.code: Code-block starting line
myst:
```{code-block} python
:name: My code
:linenos:
:lineno-start: 2
:class: fun-code
def five():
  return 5
```
html:
def five():
  return 5

title: directives.code: Code-block directive shows line numbers without explicit linenos flag
directives.figure: Simple figure

children.name: figure
children.value:
This is the figure caption!

Something! A legend!?

myst:
```{figure} https://via.placeholder.com/150
This is the figure caption!

Something! A legend!?
```

title: directives.figure: Named figure with a caption in a paragraph
myst:
```{figure} https://via.placeholder.com/150
:name: myFigure
:alt: Placeholder

This is the figure caption!
```

title: directives.figure: Named figure with a caption in a no alt
myst:
```{figure} https://via.placeholder.com/150
:name: myFigure

This is the figure caption!
```

title: directives.figure: Named figure with no space between options in directive
myst:
```{figure} https://via.placeholder.com/150
:name: myFigure
This is the figure caption!
```

title: directives.figure: Two figures
myst:
```{figure} https://via.placeholder.com/150
:name: myFigure

This is the figure caption!
```
```{figure} https://via.placeholder.com/151
:name: myOtherFigure

This is another caption!
```

title: directives.generic: Unknown directive
html:
{abc}

:a: one
:b: two

ABC directive

title: directives.generic: Unknown directive with args
myst:
```{abc} foo bar
:a: one
:b: two

ABC directive
```
html:
{abc}foo bar

:a: one
:b: two

ABC directive

title: directives.image: Image directive
directives.table: Basic list table

children.name: list-table
children.value:
*   - Head 1, Column 1
    - Head 1, Column 2
    - Head 1, Column 3
*   - Row 1, Column 1
    - Row 1, Column 2
    - Row 1, Column 3
*   - Row 2, Column 1
    - Row 2, Column 2
    - Row 2, **Column 3**

myst:
```{list-table}  Caption *text*
:name: my-table
:header-rows: 1
:align: center
:class: myclass

*   - Head 1, Column 1
    - Head 1, Column 2
    - Head 1, Column 3
*   - Row 1, Column 1
    - Row 1, Column 2
    - Row 1, Column 3
*   - Row 2, Column 1
    - Row 2, Column 2
    - Row 2, **Column 3**
```

title: footnotes: Basic footnotes

children.value: Here's one with multiple paragraphs and code.
Indent paragraphs to include them in the footnote.
Add as many paragraphs as you like.

myst:
Here's a simple footnote,[^1] and here's a longer one.[^bignote]

[^1]: This is the first footnote.

[^bignote]: Here's one with multiple paragraphs and code.

    Indent paragraphs to include them in the footnote.

    `{ my code }`

    Add as many paragraphs as you like.
html:
Here's a simple footnote,1 and here's a longer one.2

Footnotes

  1. This is the first footnote. ↩

  2. Here's one with multiple paragraphs and code.

    Indent paragraphs to include them in the footnote.

    { my code }

    Add as many paragraphs as you like. ↩

see {eq}`  matrix  `

:name: matrix

Cool caption!
```
html: see {eq}matrix

:name: my-figure

Cool caption!
```

:name: my-table

*   - Head 1
*   - Row 1
html: see Caption text

title: references.tables: Link-style table figure reference with custom ref
myst:
see [My *Table*](my-table "different title")

```{list-table}  Caption text
:name: my-table

*   - Head 1
*   - Row 1
html: see My Table
